name: Eris Eve, dino extrodinaire
anecdote: Eris loves Godzilla and her pet cat more than anything! She is also a lover of dinosaurs, bugs and all things related! She is a wealth of knowledge and enjoys sharing it. She also enjoys a good dad joke now and again. Sweet, kind, caring... You'd be hard pressed to find someone else like her. Random approves of her in the highest possible regard and can't think of a multiverse without her!

name: Chris Dream, dreams big dreams
anecdote: Chris Dream was the first friend I had in Dawntreaders, so he's held in high regard for Random. He's kind, doesn't forget things people tell him, will make you laugh in that same, Chris like voice... I can't explain it. Just listen, you'll understand. He's calm, patient and very reassuring. Definitely an A+ friend you'd want in your life. Random give him the stamp of above and beyond approval.
title: The Heart of the Party

name: Kalan'klyr Thabi, explosive energy
anecdote: Kal is never too far without Val (or Valine) in tow. They're a pair and a very welcome one at that! Every time I see him he's got this 'explosive energy' about him that really livens up the FC chat. He's always wandering around with a smile on his face no matter what has him down and instils positivity in those he cares about most, even if he's in a rough patch himself. Truly deserving of that knightly title!
title: House Fortemps Knight

name: Michi Ri, our glorious leader
anecdote: Michi is... Let me open by saying I was afraid of her! Crazy, right? People in power to remove those who are not... scary stuff! But... Michi isn't that at all! What was I thinking?! She runs Dawntreaders and she does it well, on top of all her gposing and house decorating! Yitsy is her partner and their child is Ari, adorable little one! She's kind and deserving of the praise everyone gives her!
title: Goddess of the Land

name: Raenei Hawkesbury, best bunboy
anecdote: Raenei... she's great. Moving on! :P If Rae wasn't laughing at this point then I don't know about the rest of this message! Having ALMOST gotten off on the wrong foot we almost would have never became friends... and now that we are I can't see us not being friends! Best friends, even. Besides Eris she's always in my DM's... and it's always appreciated! She brightens my day every time I see her online!
title: Trusted Friend

name: Valine Gulrath, happily blinking
anecdote: Valine is... a shy one. I thought she didn't like me at first! What random thoughts go through my head I never know! The curse of being random. But Val told me she didn't, she was just shy and I just smiled. Can't have a Val without a Kal, after all! Although the more quiet of the two her warm, welcoming smile brightens a room from any negative mood imaginable! She brings much more to the table than she thinks!
title: Pom Friend

name: Kyeler Oliver, [REDACTED] expert
anecdote: Kyeler... I have 1001 things to say but I have a limit here! Master of [REDACTED] and not afraid to show them, Kyeler really brings a personality to the those around him. Can almost never tell what's going through his mind but he's every bit as patient as Chris and helpful to anyone who ask. But be weary... he may rescue you to your doom! He's a great guy and couldn't ask for a better one!
title: Dawn Treader

name: Moder Kanin, glamorous bunboy
anecdote: Morder Kanin is... I can't speak much for myself on them as I've barely gotten to know them. But from what I've seen and their bravery to approach this crazy ass project (and his glamour plate!) he seems like a wild and good person. Looking forward to learning more about them as time goes on as I've been doing with each member... Gotta spread the Random love!
title: The Heart of the Party

name: Roxas Windstriker, cute catboy
anecdote: Roxas is a character. A very good one too. He'll make you smile even when you're down or bring the whole planet smashing down if someone made him angry! But he's a gentle soul with a peace sign to match that personality. A gpose wiz (or at least better than I am) I've seen the works of art he can output and wish I could match that stride! I'm very thankful he's on my friend list, in and out of game!
title: The Heart of the Party

name: Random Dadalian, randomness is my game
anecdote: Hihi, it's me! Random is the name, random is the game, too! This FC has been the most welcoming, eye opening and thoughtful FC I've ever been in (and I've only been in like, 5!) but it's always felt like family since day 1! I'm ignorant about the world but enjoy video games, anime and learning web development! And don't mind the gender: I don't really care! I play a female so misunderstandings are fine!
title: True Blue
